title: Optimize Coverage by Adjusting Antenna Tilt
description: To reduce interference with a neighboring cell, an agent needs to remotely adjust the electrical tilt of a cell tower antenna.

tasks.description: Identify the correct antenna and retrieve its current tilt settings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the antenna's current tilt is 4 degrees.

tasks.description: Execute the command to change the electrical tilt to 2 degrees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the command to adjust the tilt.

tasks.description: Verify that the new tilt setting has been applied successfully.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent queries the antenna again and confirms the new tilt is 2 degrees.
